column2: Update kotlin style format to kotlin style guide

column3: This change is generated from Kotlin's code style setting menu. Click on "Set from..." and then choosing "Kotlin style guide".
Let's remake the commit by opening the intellij-community project in IDEA instead of copy-pasting from the Android Studio project in a text editor.
It looks like this isn't done. (?)
It doesn't look like it. I tried this with IDEA 2019.2.4 and got different results¡ªI'm all but certain commit 324dfc5 is contaminated with settings from the Android Studio project.
Yes, commit 03922a7 matches what I saw with both 2019.2.3 and 2019.2.4. Thanks!
